prediction package¶

Submodules¶

prediction.generate_rf_model module¶

This module generates a trained random forest classifier and saves it in a pickle file.

prediction.generate_rf_model.generate_rf(df)¶

Function that generates a trained random forest classifier

Args:
df (pandas.DataFrame object): data frame that contains cleaned data
Returns:
clf (Random Forest Classifier): random forest object

prediction.rf_prediction module¶

prediction.rf_prediction.load_rf_model()¶

Function that reloads random forest object from pickle file.

Args:

Returns:
clf (Random Forest Classifier): random forest object
prediction.rf_prediction.map_data_to_sample(data)¶

Function that maps user input data to pandas data frame.

Args:
data (dictionary): dictionary that contains user input for different attributes
Returns:
df (pandas.DataFrame object): data frame that holds test data
prediction.rf_prediction.predict(data)¶

Function that returns predicted result given new test data.

Args:
data (dictionary): new test data
Returns:
result (integer): a binary response (0 or 1)
